title: Pixel 3 XL turned off and wont turn back on at all, no response?
content: Full charge this morning, never had a problem before. Randomly just died and no response. tried the methods highlighted on this website but nothing has worked - Do i take it to my network provider where i purchased, or work directly with google? not sure what to do as it should still be in warranty
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
